context.title: GSN Goal
context.description: This element represents a goal in a GSN argument. A goal (or sub-goal) captures an intention of what the argument is meant to accomplish.

context.title: GSN Strategy
context.description: This element represents a strategy in a GSN argument. Use these nodes to decompose a higher-level goal into a strategy for achieving that goal.

context.title: GSN Solution
context.description: This element represents a solution in a GSN argument. A solution is meant to fulfill its parent goal.

context.title: GSN Assumption
context.description: This element represents an assumption in a GSN argument. Assumption nodes capture information necessary to support the argument, but which may be challenged.

context.title: GSN Justification
context.description: This element represents a justification in a GSN argument. A justification explains why a particular strategy has been adopted.

context.title: GSN Context
context.description: This element represents a context in a GSN argument. A context node attaches contextual information to another node to explain its relevance.
